=== About Me ===

I still working on Ubuntu development in my country(Myanmar). Also Ubuntu Myanmar LoCo Team member and you can search me in https://launchpad.net/~thohi .Before joint to Ubuntu LoCo Team my professional job is Marine Engineer and met with Ko Ko Ye since 2010. After interest in Ubuntu/Linux world, participate with LoCo Team.Now , I study in Linux architecture and Ubuntu development to help other user for more easy to use.
